title: Project-Based Interpersonal Skills Enhancement Course for Accounting Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting principles and management experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online training for corporate accounting managers/leaders to strengthen teamwork and communication skills through practical project execution

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more effective communication strategies among team members through practical project execution.
Learners can improve role distribution and accountability within teams by 80% or more using a peer assessment system.
Learners can simulate conflict management and decision-making processes three or more times using collaboration tools (LMS forums, digital whiteboards).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
